actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release the condition requiring that a parcel of land conveyed to New York State be used for public purposes and to convey United States mineral interests in the parcel to New York State.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to release the condition requiring that a specified parcel of land in Allegany County conveyed to New York State be used for public purposes and to convey the United States mineral interests in such parcel to the State.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to release the condition requiring that a parcel of land conveyed to New York State be used for public purposes and to convey United States mineral interests in the parcel to New York State.
